Kerala.name: Thiruvananthapuram
Kerala.description: Capital city known for Kovalam beach and Padmanabhaswamy Temple.

Kerala.name: Kollam
Kerala.description: Known for Ashtamudi Lake and cashew industry.

Kerala.name: Pathanamthitta
Kerala.description: Famous for Sabarimala Temple and forests.

Kerala.name: Alappuzha
Kerala.description: Called 'Venice of the East' for its backwaters.

Kerala.name: Kottayam
Kerala.description: Known for rubber plantations and literature.

Kerala.name: Idukki
Kerala.description: Hill district famous for Munnar and dams.

Kerala.name: Ernakulam
Kerala.description: Home to Kochi, the Queen of the Arabian Sea.

Kerala.name: Thrissur
Kerala.description: Cultural capital of Kerala, known for Thrissur Pooram festival.

Kerala.name: Palakkad
Kerala.description: Gateway to Kerala, known for Palakkad Fort.

Kerala.name: Malappuram
Kerala.description: Known for rich culture and football enthusiasm.

Kerala.name: Kozhikode
Kerala.description: Historic port city known for beaches and food.

Kerala.name: Wayanad
Kerala.description: Hill district known for wildlife and waterfalls.

Kerala.name: Kannur
Kerala.description: Famous for Theyyam ritual and handlooms.

Kerala.name: Kasaragod
Kerala.description: Northernmost district known for Bekal Fort and beaches.
